story.body:
Sift Science is utilizing large-scale, real-time machine learning to help online businesses prevent fraud. Our customers include Uber, Airbnb, OpenTable, Twitter, Match.com, Indeed, and many others. We have a lot of interesting content to share, and we need someone to own, plan, and build a content marketing engine to drive market awareness for Sift.

What kinds of content will you create? Your ideas are welcome, but for starters:
Blog Posts
Infographics
Social Media (Tweets, LinkedIn Posts, etc)
Videos
E-books
Customer Case Studies
Technical Guides
Whitepapers

Sift’s marketing team is lean and agile. A few key characteristics we are looking for include:
4+ years in a content management or editorial role at a technology company
Top notch writer with a fun and playful voice
Strategic thinker when it comes to content – sure you’ll do lots of writing and editing, but you also have to own the content strategy
Execution driven – you can think big picture, but can also drive the process for getting all content to market
*Ability to understand and communicate complex technical subjects

If interested, please contact jobs at siftscience.com.
story.title: Sift Science (YC S11) Is Hiring a Content Marketing Manager
